content: pony beaded tote bag by chucky chickadee crochet thank you for grabbing this pattern this bag is inspired by the pony bead weighted blanket by lydia warren please check her out on ravelry if you d like to get an idea of the original pattern this is a variation on it to create a cute tote bag i ve used an ombre yarn and beads arranged in a way to give an ombre effect but you can use any pony beads and worsted yarn you would like my beads are 9mm with a 4mm opening please tag me chuckychickadee on instagram or twitter/x so i can see what you ve been inspired to create notes ● this pattern is written in us terms ● chain 2 at the beginning of the round counts as a stitch abbreviations chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet bead stitch place bead on hook insert hook into indicated stitch pull up a loop yarn over pull through loop bead and starting loop leaving one loop on hook materials these are the materials i used one skein red heart super saver ombre 283g/482yds worsted weight 4mm hook 2 75mm hook 1358 pony beads pattern using 4mm hook chain 61 r1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook 57 half_double_crochet across 2 half_double_crochet in last chain working on other side of chain 59 half_double_crochet across slip_stitch to beginning 2 chain 120 stitches r2 chain 2 119 half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to beginning chain 2 120 stitches switch to 2 75mm hook r3 chain 2 bead stitch half_double_crochet repeat across ending on a bead stitch 60 bead stitches 60 half_double_crochet including the beginning chain 2 switch to 4mm hook r4 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in before bead 1 half_double_crochet after bead continue to the last bead do not half_double_crochet after last bead slip_stitch to chain 2 120 half_double_crochet including chain 2 r5-38 repeat rounds 3 and 4 you can stop adding beads here if you like just follow the instructions here on with the 4mm and replace bead stitches with half_double_crochet the following instructions are for a fully beaded bag r39 using 2 75mm hook chain 2 bead stitch half_double_crochet 21 times using 4 mm hook chain 75 skip 17 stitches using to 2 75mm hook to half_double_crochet in next stitch bead stitch half_double_crochet 21 times using 4mm hook chain 75 skip 17 stitches slip_stitch to beginning chain 2 r40 chain 2 235 half_double_crochet don t forget the first half_double_crochet after the 75 chain space 236 stitches using 2 75 mm hook r41 chain 2 bead stitch half_double_crochet repeat across ending on a bead stitch using 4mm hook r42 repeat r40 r43 repeat r41 r44 repeat r40 fasten_off and weave in ends that s it i hope you liked working this project
